Категории и подкатегории: Men Home -> Dolce & Gabbana -> Shoes -> Low-Tops
Описание: A signature style of Dolce & Gabbana, the Roma sneakers are the embodiment of the brand's impeccable leatherwork thanks to their premium construction. This refreshing iteration showcases a graffiti print for AW22, continuing with the house's expertise.
Highlights: white/black; calf leather; graffiti print; round toe; logo patch at the tongue; branded insole; flat rubber sole
Состав (Composition): Sole: Rubber 100%; Lining: Calf Leather 100%; Outer: Calf Leather 100%
